article_title: China Mobile Plans to Cut Prices
article_text:
HONG KONG—China Mobile, the world's largest wireless carrier by subscribers, plans to cut prices for its new speedier mobile services by up to 50% starting next month, its latest effort to fend off rising competition.

The price-cut plan comes after China's telecom regulator began liberalizing the country's telecommunication pricing earlier this month.

China Mobile, with more than 780 million subscribers, has reported declines...
